summary: This document appears to be preparation notes for a witness's direct testimony, detailing the recruitment of a minor (referred to as 'U') by another individual ('IN') to provide massages for Jeffrey Epstein at his Palm Beach home. It describes the financial arrangements, the involvement of Ghislaine Maxwell, and the subsequent recruitment of other young girls.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referred to as 'JE' and 'Jeff', he is the wealthy individual to whom the witness and others were brought to provide massages for money at his Palm Beach home.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Referred to by the last name 'Maxwell'. The witness states that 'IN' interacted with her at Epstein's house and that a woman with a foreign accent, believed to be Maxwell, would call to schedule appointments.

connections.description: IN provided massages to Epstein for money and recruited other girls to do the same, receiving extra payment for bringing them.
IN interacted with Maxwell at Epstein's house, and Maxwell (or a woman with a foreign accent believed to be her) called to schedule IN's appointments with Epstein.
IN, who was dating U, recruited U to give massages to Jeffrey Epstein, accompanied her initially, and received a finder's fee.

events.title: Initial Recruitment for Massage
events.description: IN asked U if she wanted to make money giving a massage to 'an old guy' (Jeffrey Epstein), assuring her she would be there the whole time. The payment was stated as $200.

events.title: First Visit to Epstein's Palm Beach House
events.description: IN and U went to Jeffrey Epstein's house on El Brillo Way. After about an hour inside, IN came out with $300 and U with $200. IN received an extra $100 for bringing U.

events.title: Epstein Requests Solo Appointments
events.description: Within about two weeks of the first visit, Epstein began requesting that U come to his house by herself, which she agreed to do. IN stopped accompanying her.

events.title: IN Recruits Other Girls
events.description: IN brought other girls, including her sister and two other females, to Epstein's house. The girls were 16 or 17 years old. They would come out with money smelling of lotion.

events.title: IN Receives Gifts from Epstein
events.description: IN received lingerie and a movie from Paris mailed to her home, as well as tickets to an Incubus concert, which are understood to be gifts from Jeffrey Epstein.

locations: El Brillo Way, Palm Beach (Jeffrey Epstein's property)
keyFacts: A minor ('U'), approximately 15 years old, was recruited by her girlfriend ('IN') to give massages to Jeffrey Epstein for money, starting with accompanied visits and progressing to solo appointments.
The recruitment and scheduling involved a woman with a 'proper foreign accent' who called to set appointments, strongly implied to be Ghislaine Maxwell.
IN recruited other underage girls (aged 16-17) for Epstein, including her sister, and received extra payment ($100) for each girl she brought.
Payments for the massages were made in cash, typically $200-$500 in hundred-dollar bills, which the witnesses then spent on drugs.
IN received gifts from Epstein, including lingerie and concert tickets, sent by mail.
